FuncDef: The pki import-certificate realm default command imports the CA or local certificate loaded before delivery to the default realm. The pki import-certificate realm default command imports the CA or local certificate loaded before delivery to the default realm.
ExtraInfo:
Before a device is delivered, the CA certificate and local certificate are loaded on the device and stored in the NVRAM. The initial certificate, which can function as the device identity, is imported to the default realm to ensure the security of the device and external communication.
If you have not applied for a digital certificate, you can run this command to import the initial certificate to the default realm.
